{"id":689962218,"lang":"python","lang_name":"Python","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1651282636,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/689962218/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution(object):\n    def myPow(self, x, n):\n        \"\"\"\n        :type x: float\n        :type n: int\n        :rtype: float\n        \"\"\"\n        if(x>0):\n            return self.myPowPositive(x,n)\n        return self.myPowNegative(x,n)\n    \n    \n    def myPowPositive(self, x, n):\n        if n==0:\n            return 1\n        if n==1:\n            return x\n        return x*self.myPowPositive(x,n-1)\n    \n    \n    def myPowNegative(self,x,n):\n        if n==0:\n            return 1\n        if n==1:\n            return x\n        return x*(1/self.myPowNegative(x,n+1))","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n","has_notes":false}
